title: Blogroll update
author: VD
content_html: It has been suggested that it is time to clean up the blogroll. If you have a blog, or if you are aware of a dead link, please post the relevant information in the comments. Also, since I’m often asked what I’m reading, I’m maintaining a list that I can update whenever I remember to do so. I very much liked Brust’s downloadable Firefly novel and it would be nice to see Mal and crew continue to adventure through the ‘verse in print, since they won’t be doing so onscreen anymore.
content_text:
It has been suggested that it is time to clean up the blogroll.  If you have a blog, or if you are aware of a dead link, please post the relevant information in the comments.  Also, since I’m often asked what I’m reading, I’m maintaining a list that I can update whenever I remember to do so.  I very much liked Brust’s
downloadable Firefly novel
and it would be nice to see Mal and crew continue to adventure through the ‘verse in print, since they won’t be doing so onscreen anymore.
